participant_1.background:
I'd brag about my ability to solve complicated IT problems.
I am content with being a welder and rock climber.
i work as a lifeguard.
I have 2 sisters, but I'm not sure if my car is sentient.
I love listening to classical music while I organize my office supplies on rainy days.

participant_2.background:
My suburban is great for hauling home improvement supplies, but the weather's not cooperating.
i live on a ranch.
i m too short to reach the top shelf.
i am an amateur chef who cooks 5 different cuisines.
i aspire to paint murals.

content.text: Hi there, my name is (name). What's yours?
I'm (name). I am a welder and a rock climber.
Oh cool, I am a chef and an aspiring mural painter.
That's awesome! What kind of food do you cook?
I cook 5 different cuisines, but I'm best at Italian.
That's great! I love Italian food. I am not very good at cooking, but I am good at solving complicated IT problems.
That's a great skill to have! I have a suburban that I use to haul home improvement supplies, but the weather is not cooperating right now.
That's too bad. I love rainy days. I like to listen to classical music while I organize my office supplies.
I wish I was taller so I could reach the top shelf.
You can always use a step stool. I have 2 sisters.
I live on a ranch, so I'm used to being around animals.
That's cool! I'm a lifeguard, so I'm used to being around water.
Me too! I love hiking and camping.
Me too! We should go on an adventure together sometime.
